description.raw:
issue #1844 - during joint creation, setting the relative pose of child links after alignment causes the pose to be reset.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go into model editor 

2. Add two links

3. Click on the joint icon to launch Joint Creation dialog

4. Select parent and child link

5. Go to `Align links` section in Joint Creation dialog and click on any align configuration button (e.g. X Align Max) and check the `Reverse` checkbox

6. Go to `Relative Pose` section and try set a new pose (e.g. set Z to 0.1) - this causes the child link to reset its pose


Expanded unit test. It doesn't make the original code fail though but still nice to have.

jenkins:

[gpu-nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/131/) - ok

[abi-checker](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/API_ABI%20checker/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-vivid-amd64/134/) - ok
